item.title: The pleasures of having DTAP
item.description: No, not Diphtheria, Tetanus, and Pertussis (vaccine), but Development, Test, Acceptance, and Production (DTAP): different environments that, together with a well-working release management process, provide a way to get higher quality and reduced risks in production. DTAP is an important cornerstone for a larger infrastructure architecture as it provides environments that are tailored to the needs of many stakeholders.
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
